message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. Recognizing your interest and the significant benefit this product can bring to you, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it at a special price tailored to make it more accessible. Considering the exceptional quality and the unique features of this product, I propose a price of $1,350,000. This offer reflects my commitment to finding a mutually beneficial solution while ensuring you receive a product that meets your expectations. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss further details.
